job_details.degree_required: Bachelor’s degree or foreign equivalent required from an accredited institution

jd:
POSITION: GCP Data Engineer
LOCATION: Madison, Wisconsin Hyrbid
DURATION: 6-12+ Months Contract
Visa: USC Only

Job Description:
Required Qualifications:
Candidate must be located within commuting distance of Madison, Wisconsin or be willing to relocate to the area.
Hands on GCP experience with very good communication skill.
Bachelor’s degree or foreign equivalent required from an accredited institution.
At least 12+ years of experience with Information Technology
5+ years of experience in Google Cloud Platform (GCP) services, such as BigQuery, CloudRun, Cloud Storage, Pub/Sub, Cloud Composer, Containers, Workflows, IAM, Etc . Understanding of cloud-native solutions and architecture is critical
Strong knowledge and hands-on experience in as Python, SQL, Terraform, CI/CD, Git flows, Attunity, AutoSys, Airflow Dag creation, execution, and monitoring
Strong knowledge on Production support, Debugging and performance tuning
Effective communication skills for collaborating with global teams, including clear documentation practices and the ability to convey technical details to non-technical stakeholders.

Preferred Qualifications:
Experience in Insurance domain preferable
Good understanding of data integration, data quality and data architecture
Experience in Relational Modeling, Dimensional Modeling and Modeling of Unstructured Data
Good understanding of Agile software development frameworks
Ability to work in teams in a diverse, multi-stakeholder environment comprising of Business and Technology teams.
